item.title: Using
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: 刚刚开始写blog,有写markdown,hugo书写规范不太熟悉，总结写用的比较多的，方便日后查阅。 坚持，加油！！！ Markdown and hugo markdown官网 显示代码块 单行显示 1`单行显示` 2 多行stytle1 var num1, num2, sum num1 = prompt("Enter first number") num2 = prompt("Enter second number") sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 1```javascript 2多行stytle1 3var num1, num2, sum 4num1 = prompt("Enter first number") 5num2 = prompt("Enter second number") 6sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" 7alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 8``` 9 1 多行stytle2 2 var num1, num2, sum 3 num1 = prompt("Enter first number") 4 num2 = prompt("Enter second number") 5 sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" 6 alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 7 1 <div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-javascript" data-lang="javascript"><span class="ln">1</span> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">num1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">num2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">sum</span> 2<span class="ln">2</span> <span class="nx">num1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">prompt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Enter first number&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> 3<span class="ln">3</span> <span class="nx">num2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">prompt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Enter second number&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> 4<span class="ln">4</span> <span class="nx">sum</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">parseInt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">num1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">parseInt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">num2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">// &#34;+&#34; means &#34;add&#34; 5</span><span class="ln">5</span><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">alert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Sum = &#34;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">sum</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">// &#34;+&#34; means combine into a string 6</span><span class="ln">6</span><span class="c1"></span> 7<span class="ln">7</span></code></pre></div> 8 显示图片 gallery Sphere

item.title: Big Image Sample
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: My name is Inigo Montoya. I have the following qualities: I rock a great mustache I’m extremely loyal to my family What else do you need? my history 安达市大多 To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
